segments.text: it seems the department still has some money left in the budget . Do you have any suggestions how to use it before the budget is renewed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what about renting a restaurant and treating the employees to a nice dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but we've done that many times . We want something fresh this time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: okay , let me think . What about a party-and-movie night ? We can rearrange our reference room , invite a band to play some music , order in some food and watch a movie later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds like a good idea , but a band sounds too expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , we can ask people to make small contributions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ' t think so . I don't think people are going to like it if they have to pay to come . But we certainly can cut costs in other ways , such as make the party BYOB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: bring your own beverage . We can provide food , but people have to bring their own drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so we're just going to have a party where they bring their own drinks and we just give them some snacks ? I don't know how well that will go over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: maybe you have a point . How about having a party on a Friday afternoon ? We'll stop early , order some pizza , and serve drinks . There'll be music but no band . Having the party in the office will make
segments.speaker: S1
